body:
Successfully builds and passes all import tests on Ubuntu 20.04 (WSL) with Python 3.8.11 and GCC 9.3.0.

@tgamblin we may want to consider adding this to our Spack CI. A lot of big projects like PyTorch rely on this, and it's one of PyCQA's most popular tools.
title: py-bandit: add new package
